remarks: A scalar zero times a functional is the zero functional.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcd0vs.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcd0vs.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcd0vs.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lcd0vs.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
lcd0vs.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcd0vs.v $e |- V = ( Base ` C ) $.
lcd0vs.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` C ) $.
lcd0vs.o $e |- O = ( 0g ` C ) $.
lcd0vs.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcd0vs.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. V ) $.
lcd0vs $p |- ( ph -> ( .0. .x. G ) = O ) $.
